mapper.select: select count(*) as trafficViolationNum from t_traffic_violation where traffic_violation_time >= #{minDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and traffic_violation_time <= #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select t_traffic_violation_type.violation_type_name as trafficViolationType, count(*) as trafficViolationNum from t_traffic_violation inner join t_traffic_violation_type on t_traffic_violation.violation_type_id = t_traffic_violation_type.id group by t_traffic_violation_type.violation_type_name order by trafficViolationNum desc

SELECT t_traffic_violation.id as id, t_traffic_violation.location as location, t_traffic_violation.vehicle_type as vehicleType, t_traffic_violation.vehicle_style as vehicleStyle, t_traffic_violation.violation_type_id as violationTypeId, t_traffic_violation.traffic_violation_time as trafficViolationTime, t_traffic_violation.status as status, t_traffic_violation.img_id as imgId, t_traffic_violation.vehicle_plate as vehiclePlate, t_image.image_url as imgUrl, t_traffic_violation_type.violation_type_name as violationTypeName FROM t_traffic_violation, t_traffic_violation_type, t_image WHERE t_traffic_violation.violation_type_id = t_traffic_violation_type.id AND t_traffic_violation.img_id = t_image.image_id order by trafficViolationTime desc limit 2
